item.title: Billy Joel Surprises Crowd Attending Cover Band Concert with His First Performance Since Brain Condition Diagnosis
item.description: “I wasn’t planning on working tonight,” the 76-year-old musician said jokingly to fans in Florida on Jan. 2

item.title: Barry Manilow, 82, Posts a Selfie from His Hospital Bed and Shares Health Update After Lung Cancer Diagnosis
item.description: The "Copacabana" singer revealed in December that a cancerous spot had been found on his left lung

item.title: Mary Steenburgen Reveals What Keeps Her Marriage with Ted Danson Going Strong After 30 Years (Exclusive)
item.description: “I want him to have the happiest life possible, so I don't think I need rules to help give him that, and he feels the same way about me,” Steenburgen ...

item.title: Meghan McCain and Ben Domenech Welcome Their Third Baby, a Boy: 'We're Absolutely Over the Moon' (Exclusive)
item.description: The couple is already parents to daughters Liberty, 5, and Clover, 2

item.title: Dove Cameron Is Engaged to Måneskin Frontman Damiano David
item.description: The couple announced their engagement through an Instagram post on Jan. 3
